"""
        Generates a pd.DataFrame from the tabix results.
        """
left = pt.primer_range_left(self.pvcf['Sequence ID'], self.pvcf[
    'Primer Rank'], self.pvcf['Chromosome'], self.pvcf['Primer Left Seq'],
    self.pvcf['Position1'])
normalized = pt.match_pinfo_to_vcf(left, self.vcf_in)
left_snps = pt.tabix_fetch(normalized['Sequence ID'], normalized[
    'Primer Rank'], normalized['Chromosome'], normalized['Position1'],
    normalized['Position2'], self.vcf_in)
left_df = pt.tabix_results_to_df(left_snps, 'L', 'Left SNP Count')
self.assertEqual(left_df['Left SNP Count'][0], 10)
